name: guraQuest (Lee-Pic)
description:
WASD/ArrowKeys || move      SPACE/Up/Z || jump      J/X || charge/dash

Hold Enter to menu

hold jump to jump higher

jump in the air to double jump

-Reload the page if music is not working.

-Gamemaker 2 is bad and runs slow on some browsers on some computers, try a different browser if the game feels slowed down.
